plugins.name: Text Changer
plugins.description: Magic Text Replace is a Figma plugin designed to streamline text editing workflows. It allows users to find and replace text across selected layers or the entire document, with options for case sensitivity, whole-word matching, and regular expressions. The plugin also keeps a history of replacements for easy reapplication and provides a preview of text layers for better control.
plugins.tagline: find and replace text in Figma with advanced options like case sensitivity, regex, and more.

124704.name: Text Changer
124704.description: Magic Text Replace is a Figma plugin designed to streamline text editing workflows. It allows users to find and replace text across selected layers or the entire document, with options for case sensitivity, whole-word matching, and regular expressions. The plugin also keeps a history of replacements for easy reapplication and provides a preview of text layers for better control.
124704.tagline: find and replace text in Figma with advanced options like case sensitivity, regex, and more.

plugins.name: Convert To Bionic Writing
plugins.description:
Unlock Faster, More Focused Reading with Bionic Reading: This plugin applies the Bionic Reading method (bionic-reading.com) to your text layers, dynamically bolding the initial letters of words to improve reading speed and comprehension. By leveraging the natural fixation points of the eye, Bionic Reading helps readers process text more efficiently with less cognitive effort. This plugin works best with fonts that offer multiple weight variations.


Key Features:


  1. Converts selected text layers to Bionic Reading format.
  2. Optimizes text for faster and more focused reading.
  3. Ideal for improving readability and engagement.



Open Source: github.com/mrayubmuhammad/Convert-To-Bionic-Writing-Figma-Plugin



Created by d3flow (www.d3flow.com) using Claude.ai.

Note: Requires fonts with multiple weight options for optimal performance.

accepted.name: Ayub Muhammad
accepted.description: Cofounder at d3flow where we Design, Develop and Distribute in flow.

accepted.name: d3flow
accepted.description: Design, Develop, Distribute in flow with d3flow

plugins.tagline: Focused Reading, Better Typography

plugins.name: Frame to JSON - AI-powered Design-to-Code Converter
plugins.description:
üéØ What is it?

A powerful Figma plugin that transforms your design frames into structured JSON data, ensuring seamless developer handoff and design-to-code consistency.


‚ú® Key Features

‚Ä¢AI-powered frame analysis

‚Ä¢One-click frame-to-JSON conversion

‚Ä¢Complete hierarchy and style preservation

‚Ä¢Customizable export options

‚Ä¢Developer-friendly structured output


üöÄ How to Use

1.Select your target frame(s) in Figma

2.Launch the Frame to JSON plugin

3.Review the extracted structure and properties

4.Click ‚ÄúGenerate JSON‚Äù

5.Copy or download the JSON output instantly


üõ†Ô∏è What You‚Äôll Need

‚Ä¢Figma design frames


üîí Security Note

Your data is processed securely, with no external storage. The plugin ensures precise design-to-code conversion while maintaining full control over your export preferences. No more manual adjustments‚Äîlet AI handle the complexity! ‚ú®
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma frames into clean JSON with one click your design-to-development bridge made simple!

plugins.name: Absurd Ipsum
plugins.description:
Embrace the Absurdity in Your Design!

Fill the void with chaotic, hilarious placeholder text‚Äîbecause why settle for boring when you can have weird?


Absurd Ipsum does exactly what it says‚Äîgenerate random paragraphs, usernames, quotes, error messages, and headings for your designs.


Preview the madness, copy the text to your clipboard, and unleash it wherever you like!


Enjoy the randomness‚Äîmaybe you'll laugh, or at least wonder if your coffee mug is plotting against you.
plugins.tagline: Just like Lorem Ipsum but with a pinch of absurdity for your designs.

plugins.name: Schemator
plugins.description:
Schemator provides a flexible schema for your components helping you build code connect and write further tooling on it.


  1. Consistent Naming - Establish a universal schema for component properties, promoting seamless collaboration and code integration across teams and projects.
  2. Predictable Structure - Adopt a familiar and logical naming convention, ensuring that components are intuitive to use and easy to extend.
  3. Sanitized Definitions - Enable customization by adding suffixes and prefixes to property definitions, giving developers the flexibility to tailor components to their specific workflows.


Schemator is full open sourced, feel free to make changes to the rules and logic as you like üòÄ
plugins.tagline: Strucutre schema of your Figma components

plugins.name: Live Flip Clock
plugins.description: Bring a touch of style and functionality to your Figma workspace with Flip Clock! This modern digital clock plugin lets you add a real-time flip clock to your designs, perfect for dashboards, presentations, or just keeping track of time while you work. Choose from a variety of color themes, customize the size, and decide whether to display seconds‚Äîall with a simple, intuitive interface. Whether you want a bold accent or a subtle timekeeper, Flip Clock adapts to your workflow. Stay inspired, stay on time, and make your workspace uniquely yours with Flip Clock.

plugins.name: Blink Notes
plugins.description:
Blink Notes is the fastest way to capture ideas and attach notes directly to your Figma frames ‚Äî instantly and effortlessly.


With Blink Notes, you can:

  1. Quickly create notes linked to specific frames
  2. Organize thoughts without breaking your design flow
  3. Keep your feedback, ideas, and to-dos right where you need them
  4. Stay focused with a clean, minimal, distraction-free interface


Designed for speed, collaboration, and creativity, BlinkNotes helps you streamline your design process and never lose an idea again.


Add Blink Notes to your workflow and start designing smarter today.

accepted.name: Siddhant giri
accepted.description: Product Designer and a Frontend Developer from India.

plugins.name: Sentence case checker and converter
plugins.description:
Make your typography clean, consistent, and user-friendly.


Sentence Case Checker helps you scan all visible text layers in a selected frame and highlights any unintended capital letters mid-sentence ‚Äî like those annoying This Is a Sentence errors.


‚úÖ Detect sentence casing issues

‚úÖ Shows all problematic phrases in a list

‚úÖ Locate each error directly on canvas

‚úÖ Convert individual words or fix all in one click

‚úÖ Real-time refresh when changing selection


Supports UI writing best practices and editorial consistency!
plugins.tagline: Automatically detect and fix mid-sentence capitalization issues in your Figma designs.

130908.name: Sentence case checker and converter
130908.description:

‚Äì Better handling of sentence boundaries to reduce false positives.
This update makes the plugin smarter and more accurate for real-world content.
130908.tagline: Automatically detect and fix mid-sentence capitalization issues in your Figma designs.

plugins.name: Token Swapper
plugins.description:
To use it, simply activate the plugin, import any component from any library, and it does the rest! üöÄ


https://www.loom.com/share/6d526c11f63644318e9c604193e11e3d


Effortless Token Swapping Across Files

Swap Design Tokens between your design system and working files in seconds. Maintain consistency without duplicating libraries or styles.


Full-page Token Replacement

Need to update a full design with new tokens? One click with "Swap All" updates every node, text style, and color variable instantly ‚Äî no manual work required.


Intelligent Scan & Replace

Automatically scan files for elements not linked to tokens ‚Äî including colors and fonts ‚Äî and batch replace them with variables from your design system. Eliminate inconsistencies with a few clicks.


Cross-theme & Project Flexibility

Manage multiple projects with a single design system source. Token Swapper ensures all visual assets remain connected to their proper tokens, even across brands or themes.


Non-destructive Workflow

Token Swapper doesn‚Äôt overwrite or break your original styles. Switch between token sets and preview changes without permanent commitment ‚Äî perfect for testing themes or migrating designs.


Smart Query Processing

Let the plugin process bulk token changes in the background. Your edits persist even when closing the plugin, making large updates smoother and safer.


Beta Features: More Power, More Control

Our beta tools let you go even deeper ‚Äî manage font tokens, swap icons, and process entire pages. Just stay in the same token session for best results while we keep improving.


FAQs

Does this work with free Figma plans?

Yes! Token Swapper is fully compatible with all Figma plans ‚Äî free included. No need for professional tiers to keep your tokens in sync.


What if I use my own token naming system?

That‚Äôs okay! As long as your token names and structure match across files, Token Swapper will recognize and replace them intelligently.


Why use Token Swapper instead of doing it manually?

Manual token swaps are time-consuming, error-prone, and hard to scale. Token Swapper automates the entire process, saving you hours of work and ensuring consistency.


Tutorials

https://www.loom.com/share/3d743648bd3643e5a50b7dff7d54bbf2

https://www.loom.com/share/b3a6f11e12734fe18da5d30106fe4c54

https://www.loom.com/share/0ec7731eb20f404d9259222377f40cef
plugins.tagline: Swaps font, color and space tokens of components imported from other libraries.

plugins.name: Icon Resizer
plugins.description:
The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you‚Äôre working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.

The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
plugins.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

118276.name: Icon Resizer
118276.description:
The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you‚Äôre working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.

The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
118276.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

plugins.description:

This plugin automatically adds aliases to Icon descriptions to make Icons easily searchable.

plugins.description:

‰ΩøÁî®ÂØπÁÖßË°®ÁøªËØëËÆæËÆ°Á®øÊó∂ÔºåÊòØ‰∏çÊòØÂè™ËÉΩÂèçÂ§çÁöÑÂ§çÂà∂Á≤òË¥¥Ôºü

Áé∞Âú®Âè™ÈúÄ‰∏§Ê≠•ËΩªÊùæÊêûÂÆöÔºåÂø´Êù•ËØïËØïÂêßÔºÅ


Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊ≠•Ôºö‰∏ÄÈîÆÂØºÂá∫ÂéüÊñá

ÔºàÂØºÂá∫ÁöÑCSVÊñá‰ª∂‰∫§Áªô‰∏ì‰∏öÁöÑÁøªËØë‰∫∫ÂëòËøõË°åÁøªËØëÔºâ

Á¨¨‰∫åÊ≠•Ôºö‰∏ÄÈîÆÂØºÂÖ•ÁøªËØë


ËΩªÊùæËÆæËÆ°ÔºåËΩªÊùæÊë∏È±º ^_^


-------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attention, overseas project designers!

When translating design drafts using a comparison table, do you have to rely on repeated copying and pasting?

plugins.name: Showcase
plugins.description:
Showcase makes presenting specific frames to your team effortless. Whether you‚Äôre walking through a design or highlighting a particular frame, Showcase lets you do so directly within the canvas, offering smooth flyover animations for a seamless presentation. Independent of the zoom level, you have full control over how close or far you view your frames‚Äîadjust zoom as desired.


Showcase is also helpful when working with large files that contain many frames. If you ever feel lost in the canvas, Showcase helps you quickly focus on a specific frame by simply selecting it from the layers panel.


Showcase is free to use. If you find it helpful, consider supporting the project by buying me a coffee ‚òïÔ∏è.

accepted.description: Hey üëãüèº  I'm an interaction designer with a passion for nifty productivity tools.

plugins.name: Lindi for Tawakkalna
plugins.description:
Lindi revolutionizes the way UI/UX designs are created by leveraging advanced artificial intelligence to automate and enhance the design process. Users can rapidly prototype, iterate, and finalize visually appealing and user-friendly UI/UX designs.


This plugin is solely made for Tawakkalna Services allowing entities to build flows and designs with Tawakkalna's Design System rules.


The Plugin generates and transfers ready made designs from Lindi - The AI Designer to Figma allowing designers to view, create, and modify the contents of the files in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Design Smarter, Build Faster: Empowering UI/UX with AI precision.

Features:

  1. Smart Layer Renaming: Instantly organize and standardize your layer names for better collaboration and design management.
  2. AutoLayout Conversion (Coming Soon): Automatically transform your designs into responsive AutoLayout components with one click.
  3. Design Linting (Coming Soon): Detect and fix inconsistencies, find missing styles, and ensure your designs follow best practices.


Boost your productivity and maintain design consistency with our easy-to-use tools. Focus on creativity while our AI handles the technical details.


Our mission is to enhance productivity and creativity, making high-level design techniques accessible to all and streamlining the creation of enriching visual content.


More Information

Simple Organizer helps you create a clean and structured workspace instantly with a predefined folder system. Just run the plugin, and your project will be organized in seconds!

  1. Run the Simple Organizer plugin

Pre-built Folder Structure:

plugins.name: TXT to Artboard
plugins.description:
TXT to Artboard allows you to quickly generate multiple artboards by entering their name, width, and height in a simple text format.


This plugin is perfect for setting up design systems, responsive layouts, or multi-screen projects with different screen sizes.


Just input the details, and the plugin will automatically create and arrange the artboards on your canvas. Save time and stay organized with this essential design tool.


Examples

og-contact,1200,630

ig/story-recruiting,1080,1920

ig/post-recruiting,1080,1080

plugins.name: Figma Frame History
plugins.description:
This tool enables version-controlled frame history management directly on the page. It offers four key commands:


‚Ä¢ Major Version: Select a BASE NODE on the page and execute this command. A NEW NODE will be created right after the BASE NODE, with a version control suffix in its name (e.g., Frame_1.0 ‚Üí Frame_v2.0).


‚Ä¢ Minor Version: Similar to the **Major Version** command, but only the minor version number is incremented by 1 (e.g., Frame_1.0 ‚Üí Frame_v1.1).


‚Ä¢ Unlock History: This command unlocks all previously locked frames in the history, restoring them to their default style.


‚Ä¢ Lock History: This command locks all history frames again, making them transparent.


If the BASE NODE name does not include a version control suffix _${majorVersion}.${minorVersion}, the NEW NODE name will default to ${baseNodeName}_v1.0 when either the Major Version or Minor Version command is executed.

accepted.name: RyanHuang üëÄ
accepted.description:
üî∏ Product Designer
üî∏ Heavy user of Figma
üî∏ Beginner in FE

plugins.tagline: A frame history management tool for creating and organizing frame versions directly on the page

This tool enables version-controlled frame history management directly on the page. It offers four key commands:


‚Ä¢ Major Version: Select a BASE NODE on the page and execute this command. A NEW NODE will be created right after the BASE NODE, with a version control suffix in its name (e.g., Frame_1.0 ‚Üí Frame_v2.0).


‚Ä¢ Minor Version: Similar to the **Major Version** command, but only the minor version number is incremented by 1 (e.g., Frame_1.0 ‚Üí Frame_v1.1).


‚Ä¢ Unlock History: This command unlocks all previously locked frames in the history, restoring them to their default style.


‚Ä¢ Lock History: This command locks all history frames again, making them transparent.


If the BASE NODE name does not include a version control suffix _${majorVersion}.${minorVersion}, the NEW NODE name will default to ${baseNodeName}_v1.0 when either the Major Version or Minor Version command is executed.
123378.tagline: A frame history management tool for creating and organizing frame versions directly on the page

plugins.name: tokenXtractor - by techworks studio
plugins.description:
tokenXtractor is a Figma plugin thoughtfully crafted to make exporting local variables, or tokens, easy and accessible. Its usage is fairly straightforward: configure your options, select your collections, and then download them.


1) Configure your options


  1. Case Style
  2. Export Single File
  3. Export Format


2) Select your collections


All collections are selected by default, so if you would like to export all your collections, you can skip this step. Otherwise, click on the variable collection name to select / deselect it for export.You can select multiple using CMD + Click (MacOS) or CTRL + Click (Windows). To select a range, click the first collection and then SHIFT + Click the last collection.You can undo your selection by clicking the 'RESET' button next to 'Collections?'


3) Download your tokens


Finally, press the 'DOWNLOAD TOKENS' button, save the zip file where you'd like, and then unzip the file to access your exported tokens.


Previewing + Misc. Tips


The right half of the plugin contains a 'preview' of the tokens to be exported. When exporting multiple files, you can use the dropdown menu next to 'Previewing' to switch the collection you're viewing.


------------------------------

Brought to you by techworks.studio

------------------------------
plugins.tagline: Export local variables to code-ready files

113188.name: tokenXtractor - by techworks studio

  3. Export Format


2) Select your collections


All collections are selected by default, so if you would like to export all your collections, you can skip this step. Otherwise, click on the variable collection name to select / deselect it for export.You can select multiple using CMD + Click (MacOS) or CTRL + Click (Windows). To select a range, click the first collection and then SHIFT + Click the last collection.You can undo your selection by clicking the 'RESET' button next to 'Collections?'


3) Download your tokens


Finally, press the 'DOWNLOAD TOKENS' button, save the zip file where you'd like, and then unzip the file to access your exported tokens.


Previewing + Misc. Tips


The right half of the plugin contains a 'preview' of the tokens to be exported. When exporting multiple files, you can use the dropdown menu next to 'Previewing' to switch the collection you're viewing.


------------------------------

Brought to you by techworks.studio

113188.tagline: Export local variables to code-ready files

plugins.name: Avctoris Copyright
plugins.description:
The Avctoris Copyright plugin for Figma is a comprehensive tool designed to help creators protect and manage their intellectual property rights effortlessly. With this plugin, users can seamlessly generate a PDF certificate of their design work directly from their Figma workspace, ensuring that their creations are legally safeguarded.


Key Features:


Automated PDF Generation: Export your design assets into a PDF format for easy documentation and protection.

Intellectual Property Management: Record detailed information about the authors and holders of rights for each creation.

Secure Registration: Easily submit your work for copyright registration and receive a certificate, ensuring your designs are legally protected.

User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive UI integrated into Figma, allowing for a smooth and seamless experience.

Real-Time Collaboration: Continue collaborating on designs while managing copyrights without leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Where Ideas Come to Life

97497.description:

plugins.name: .dot
plugins.description:
.dot is a design command line tool that integrates with Figma, transforming the quick actions menu into a powerful command line interface. With .dot, designers can seamlessly access Tailwind functions, apply colors, and perform a wide range of tasks with speed and efficiency‚Äîbringing coding-like control to Figma's design environment.


Example Usage:

  1. It's easy, With a frame select type Cmd + P and .
  2. Choose the .dot plugin
  3. Type 'flex p-8 rounded-md bg-zinc-500' to create a styled container

accepted.name: Matthew Ortega
accepted.description:
A studio exploring technology to invent new forms of art & design

Figma training & design systems @ Fabric Co.

plugins.tagline: Supercharge Figma with Tailwind and custom commands at your fingertips.

parameters.name: type or choose your commands
parameters.description: Enter one or more commands seperated by white spaces

104162.tagline: Supercharge Figma with Tailwind and custom commands at your fingertips.

plugins.name: Unidup
plugins.description:
Create a design set template that includes component usage and color schemes. With this plugin, you can duplicate your template to a new page, automatically apply new instances of the original component's new variants under consistent layers, and create brand new color schemes.


Additionally, color schemes can be exported in JSON format.



Document Preparation


Document Structure: Prepare the design drafts of the design scheme, which should include "Components Page" and "Template Page", as well as "Color Scheme".


Naming: Each reuse of the design scheme should have a unique name, let's tentatively call it "NAME". This naming is very important as it runs through the entire reuse process.


Template Page: The "Template Page" is the page of your design scheme, and its name should be called NAME. It will play a big role in subsequent work, transforming into various new outputs and serving various new purposes. Therefore, each artboard should contain instances of components for reuse.


Components Page: Each time the design scheme is reused, the output should be unique. The "Components Page" contains unique elements in each set of outputs, and each component should include variants, with the key of the variant being "name" and the value being NAME, to correspond with each set of outputs.


Color Scheme: The naming method for local color schemes in figma is xxx/xxx. When naming, please follow the structure NAME/color1, NAME/color2.



How to Use


Duplicate and Export JSON are two main functions.


Duplicate:

There are three cards in the interface, namely "Components Page", "From Template", and "New Page Naming".


  1. Select your "Components Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "Components Page", and the card will display the details of the "Components Page".
  2. Select your "Template Page", click the "Apply Selected Page" button to the right of "From template", and the card will display the details of the "Template Page".
  3. In the "New Page Naming" card, name your new output.
  4. Click the "Duplicate" button, and you have extended a new output from the "Template Page". Modify the associated components and color scheme, and this output is ready.



Export JSON:

It will list the NAME of all your output schemes, click to export the rgba color values, and download the json to your local.




See usage demo file:

https://www.figma.com/file/jUg3U53QSIzWBEn0RfUdB0/
plugins.tagline: Unidup - An easy way to reuse your design set

plugins.name: SVG to Figma
plugins.description: Easily paste your SVG code and convert it into editable vector layers directly inside Figma. No need to import files or use external tools.
plugins.tagline: Quickly insert SVG code as vector shapes in Figma
